;By car:Maynooth is on Ontario Highway 62, north of
Maynooth itself is extremely small and everything there is within easy walking distance.

Maynooth is a good place to base visits to Algonquin Provincial Park with beautiful Canoeing, Kayaking, Camping and Hiking,

The local youth hostel provides trips to the park, which is otherwise a short car ride away.

The Local Library has free internet.
Ottawa and Toronto are approximately 4 hours away.
